name: Time Rangers
description:
Originally developed as Clock Jammers in less than a month for Winter Awful Jam 2018, we are continuing development and plan on a commercial release by Fall 2018.

Summary

You are the Time Rangers, an elite combat unit protecting history from criminal tampering. From your time travel space station you must keep watch across the ages. Utilize heavy weaponry, all-terrain mechas, and incredible time powers to protect your timeline from trans-dimensional crime syndicates.

Controls
  • Left-click to select or examine units
  • Right-click when a unit is selected to execute a command
  • Right-click when no unit is selected to jump to next available unit
  • WASD / Arrow keys to pan the camera
  • ESC to return to the level screen and party roster screen
